AR 87. Health issues resulting, for example, from smoking, drug and alcohol abuse, physical
inactivity, unhealthy diets, and psychosocial factors unrelated to work are not considered
work-related.
AR 88. Occupational diseases are not considered work-related injuries but are covered under work-
